summary: One week in one of the most exotic and picturesque cities of the world. The day of changes comes when Amaya meets a charming Englishman, Paul and it dramatically changes Amaya's perception of her cultural and personal identity.
cast: Kaori Momoi|Andrius Mamontovas|Dan Lau|Shiu Hung Hui|Monie Tung|Kristine Nevarauska|Laura Dzenite|Margaret Cheung|Dexter Fletcher|James Bishop|Sammy Chiu|Thomas Mak|To Hing Wong|Woon-Ling Hau|Yuk Hing Chan|Chung Wah Lo|Yuet Mei Wong|Ka Chun Cheung|Moon Sau Ting Wong
title: Amaya
